ing: 1 tablespoon mocha-flavored instant coffee mix (such as International CoffeeÂ® Suisse Mocha)
1 teaspoon powdered chocolate drink mix (such as NesquikÂ®)
des: "A mixture of instant flavored coffee and instant hot cocoa that looks and tastes like it came from a cafe! Top with a dollop of whipped cream and a pinch of cinnamon!"
ins:
Microwave milk in an microwave-safe glass or bowl until almost boiling, about 1 minute 45 seconds.
Stir coffee mix, sugar, and chocolate mix together in a mug. Pour hot milk over coffee mixture and stir until mixture is dissolved.
